content: sorry another bird - but it s a freebee for #freebeefridayknits instagram feed @dotpebbles and it answers all of your prayers regarding what can we make for teacher this year gift idea because it doubles as a bookmark - yay knitted flat in one piece using simple garter stitch to create the subtle shapings - this unique bookmark bird is simple to knit and makes an uber quirky quick i made one in under an hour gift for your best teacher p s… don t forget every friday please feel free to drop in to my instagram feed @dotpebbles_knits for #freebeefridayknits - patterns from old and new free for a day for more information see http //www instagram com/dotpebbles_knits/ ❤️#freebeefridayknits @dotpebbles_knits on instagram - follow the feed so that you don t miss out ever o❤️ x for more information see http //www instagram com/dotpebbles/
